H
ealth worker wellbeing 
Many of us are affected by violence in our personal lives or feel distressed by the violence that we hear about with our 
patients/clients. We need to take care of ourselves in doing this work to protect our own mental health and to ensure our 
ability to be effective professionals. 
See resources above and HealthworkerConnect
